recipesJson.name: False Stones
recipesJson.author: Wilkybob69
recipesJson.description: Tfa sweet raspberry with inw raspberry are my favourite blend of raspberry coupled with fa wow really help that raspberry to the forefront whilst fa zepolla adds that lovely deep fried donut and to finish that allround donut flavour waxy glaze with that doughy fried donut topped off with vanilla bean ice cream I have been working towards this recipe for at least six month I'm very pleased with its outcome it really does vape well after 48 hrs but give it four weeks and it's dynamite hope you enjoy mixing my recipe any feedback is important either negative or or positive it really is a nice raspberry jelly filled donuts
